mdRecord.dcterms:description: Origami animals (one of which is written on). Written on shelf, label identifying shelf as the Origami Shelf, with date 2018. Also written on shelf, warning to steer clear of white women. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Bye, Buddy. Hope you find your Dad. | Origami Shelf est. 2018 | Stay away from White Women

Race
Stereotypes (Social psychology)
